attr.title: Flip of Light
attr.desc: Taking inspiration from platformers of the last decade, Flip of Light will test genre veterans with mind-bending, gravity-swapping challenges. Run, jump, and flip your way through a variety of vibrant stages, each themed around one chromatic color.
attr.inst:
Purchase your game from Itch.io or Steam. 
Download the latest version of the game and place all your game files in ports/flipoflight/assets
attr.inst_md:
Purchase your game from [Itch.io](https://leko20.itch.io/flip-of-light) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2015460/Flip_of_Light/). 

Download the latest version of the game and place all your game files in ports/flipoflight/assets.
